title: Senators Postpone Crypto Market Bill as Coinbase Flexes Its Muscle in Washington
full_text: Senators Postpone Crypto Market Bill as Coinbase Flexes Its Muscle in Washington. Coinbase's CEO isn't happy. Senators pump the brakes.. On Wednesday evening, the Senate Banking Committee delayed final discussions around a bill for creating greater regulatory clarity for crypto in the United States, fittingly known as the Clarity Act.… [+5574 chars]

On Wednesday evening, the Senate Banking Committee delayed final discussions around a bill for creating greater regulatory clarity for crypto in the United States, fittingly known as the Clarity Act.… [+5574 chars]
